note: Exploring abandoned mines in Kernow which is basically hollow after several thousand years of mineral extraction. There will may also be random stuff I find interesting at the time, pics of my dog, models and the occasional bit of armour.  Warning: Mine exploration is dangerous and not to be attempted by inexperienced idiots.
